```{r}
library(ggforce)
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)

url = "https://data.giss.nasa.gov/gistemp/graphs/graph_data/Global_Mean_Estimates_based_on_Land_and_Ocean_Data/graph.txt"
d <- fread(url,
      skip = 5)

x = seq(1,1000, by = .1)
y1 = sin(x) + sin(x/5) + sin(x^2/200)
y2 = cospi(x) + cos(x)
y3 = cos(x) + sin(x)
df = data.frame(x, y1, y2, y3) %>% 
  tidyr::gather("var", "value", y1:y3)

ggplot(df, aes(x, value, group = var, color = var)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d() +
  coord_polar()
```
